fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm clipboard collection paths removed
fields.request_details:
1. Sign in to the Django admin and open Content Samples. Confirm there is no "Add from clipboard" link or action on the changelist.
2. Manually browse to /admin/nodes/contentsample/from-clipboard/ and verify the URL is no longer available (expect a 404).
3. Run `./manage.py help` and confirm `sample_clipboard` is not listed among available commands.
